com.jgoodies.forms.debug
Class FormDebugPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.jgoodies.forms.debug.FormDebugPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public final class FormDebugPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A panel that paints grid bounds if and only if the panel's layout manager is a FormLayout. In addition, you can choose to dump information about the layout grid, layout groups and cell constraints to the console.

Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
See Also:
FormDebugUtils, Serialized Form

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paints the panel. If the panel's layout manager is a FormLayout it paints the form's grid lines.
